goal: Enforce full file paths in all Claude Code operations

fields.who: Claude Code sessions and file operation tools
fields.what: Enforce all file paths in Claude Code operations are absolute (not relative)
fields.why: Relative paths cause ambiguity, wrong file operations, inconsistent logging, and difficult auditing
fields.how: Create PreToolUse hook that validates file_path starts with / (Unix) or drive letter (Windows)
fields.which: Read, Write, Edit, Glob, Grep tools - file_path parameter validation
fields.lest: Must not block valid absolute paths; must not break existing workflows
fields.with: TypeScript, hooks framework, path validation utilities
fields.measuredBy: Hook implemented for all file operation tools; cross-platform support (Unix/Windows); helpful error messages; CLAUDE.md updated
